title: Chili-Lemon Greek Yogurt Dip
description: A quick, kid-friendly dip made from Greek yogurt, mild chili powder, and lemon juice (or lemon juice substitute). Perfect for chicken quesadillas or veggie sides.
ingredients: 1 tsp maple syrup (optional, helps balance the acidity and makes it more kid-friendly)
instructions: In a small bowl, combine Greek yogurt, chili powder, lemon juice, and salt.
Stir until smooth and well mixed.
Taste and add maple syrup if you'd like a slightly sweeter, more balanced dip.
Serve immediately or refrigerate for up to 3 days.
notes: For a thinner consistency, add 1–2 teaspoons of water or milk. Chili powder here refers to the mild blend, not pure chili flakes or cayenne.
